QuestData.Title: Tying Up Loose Ends
QuestData.Description: Malfurion Stormrage managed to make landfall in Val'sharah and has already taken care of things there. It seems our fortune is finally turning around!$B$BHe's waiting for you as we speak in Lorlathil. Life is so magical when everything goes according to plan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Aludane Whitecloud at Krasus' Landing to secure a flight to Val'sharah. Speak to Malfurion Stormrage after you arrive in Lorlathil.
